targets.rawSql: select CONCAT(DAYNAME(e.expend_date), " ",DAY(e.expend_date),",  ",MONTHNAME(e.expend_date)," ", YEAR(e.expend_date)) as "Date" from expenses as e order by expend_date desc limit 1
select sum(price) from expenses where category_id in ($categories)

select AVG(price), category_id
from expenses
where category_id like "%Service%"
AND  year(expend_date) in ($year) 
group by 2
order by 1

SELECT
  expend_date,
  (
    SELECT
      SUM(b.price)
    FROM
      expenses AS b
    WHERE
      b.expend_date <= a.expend_date
      AND category_id  in ($categories)
  ) AS "Acumulation select categories"
FROM
  expenses AS a
WHERE
  category_id  in ($categories)
GROUP BY
  2
ORDER BY
  expend_date
ASC;

SELECT e.product AS "Product",
       concat(e.price, " €") AS "Price",
       c.name AS "Category",
       e.people AS "People",
       CONCAT(DAYNAME(e.expend_date), " ", DAY(e.expend_date), ",  ", MONTHNAME(e.expend_date), " ", YEAR(e.expend_date)) AS "Date"
       FROM expenses AS e
JOIN categories AS c ON e.category_id=c.id
WHERE category_id in ($categories)
ORDER BY e.expend_date desc

select expend_date as time, monthname(expend_date) as 'metrics', sum(price) as "€" from expenses where category_id in ($categories) and month(expend_date)=1 and year(expend_date) in ($year) group by month(expend_date) order by time asc

select expenses.expend_date as time, monthname(expenses.expend_date) as 'metrics', sum(price) as "€" from expenses where category_id in ($categories) and month(expenses.expend_date)=2 and year(expenses.expend_date) in ($year) group by month(expenses.expend_date) order by time asc

select expenses.expend_date as time, monthname(expenses.expend_date) as 'metrics', sum(price) as "€" from expenses where category_id in ($categories) and month(expenses.expend_date)=3 and year(expenses.expend_date) in ($year) group by month(expenses.expend_date) order by time asc

select expenses.expend_date as time, monthname(expenses.expend_date) as 'metrics', sum(price) as "€" from expenses where category_id in ($categories) and month(expenses.expend_date)=4 and year(expenses.expend_date) in ($year) group by month(expenses.expend_date) order by time asc

select expenses.expend_date as time, monthname(expenses.expend_date) as 'metrics', sum(price) as "€" from expenses where category_id in ($categories) and month(expenses.expend_date)=5 and year(expenses.expend_date) in ($year) group by month(expenses.expend_date) order by time asc

select expenses.expend_date as time, monthname(expenses.expend_date) as 'metrics', sum(price) as "€" from expenses where category_id in ($categories) and month(expenses.expend_date)=6 and year(expenses.expend_date) in ($year) group by month(expenses.expend_date) order by time asc

select expenses.expend_date as time, monthname(expenses.expend_date) as 'metrics', sum(price) as "€" from expenses where category_id in ($categories) and month(expenses.expend_date)=7 and year(expenses.expend_date) in ($year) group by month(expenses.expend_date) order by time asc

select expenses.expend_date as time, monthname(expenses.expend_date) as 'metrics', sum(price) as "€" from expenses where category_id in ($categories) and month(expenses.expend_date)=8 and year(expenses.expend_date) in ($year) group by month(expenses.expend_date) order by time asc

select expenses.expend_date as time, monthname(expenses.expend_date) as 'metrics', sum(price) as "€" from expenses where category_id in ($categories) and month(expenses.expend_date)=9  and year(expenses.expend_date) in ($year) group by month(expenses.expend_date) order by time asc

select expenses.expend_date as time, monthname(expenses.expend_date) as 'metrics', sum(price) as "€" from expenses where category_id in ($categories) and month(expenses.expend_date)=10  and year(expenses.expend_date) in ($year) group by month(expenses.expend_date) order by time asc

select expenses.expend_date as time, monthname(expenses.expend_date) as 'metrics', sum(price) as "€" from expenses where category_id in ($categories) and month(expenses.expend_date)=11  and year(expenses.expend_date) in ($year) group by month(expenses.expend_date) order by time asc

select expenses.expend_date as time, monthname(expenses.expend_date) as 'metrics', sum(price) as "€" from expenses where category_id in ($categories) and month(expenses.expend_date)=12  and year(expenses.expend_date) in ($year) group by month(expenses.expend_date) order by time asc

SELECT sum(price) as "€",
  category_id
FROM expenses
WHERE category_id in ($categories)
GROUP BY category_id

select name as "Category", sum(price) as "€" from expenses join categories on expenses.category_id=categories.id where categories.id not in ("rent", "gifts", "cleaning") and month(expenses.expend_date)=$month and year(expenses.expend_date) in ($year) group by category_id order by 2 desc;

SELECT $__timeGroup(expend_date, "30d",0) AS time,
  sum(price) as "€",
  category_id
FROM (SELECT * from expenses) as expenses
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(expend_date) and category_id in ($categories)
group by  $__timeGroup(expend_date, "30d")  ,category_id
ORDER BY expend_date

SELECT $__timeGroup(expend_date, "30d",0) AS time,
  sum(price) as "€",
  category_id
FROM expenses
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(expend_date) and category_id in ($categories)
group by 1 ,category_id
ORDER BY expend_date
select price from expenses where category_id in ($categories) group by price order by 1 desc

SELECT e.*, c.name
FROM expenses AS e
JOIN categories AS c ON e.category_id=c.id
WHERE category_id in ($categories)
ORDER BY e.expend_date desc

list.definition: select year(expenses.expend_date) as year from expenses
list.name: year
list.query: select year(expenses.expend_date) as year from expenses

list.definition: select month(expenses.expend_date) as __value, monthname(expenses.expend_date) as __text   from expenses order by 1 asc
list.name: month
list.query: select month(expenses.expend_date) as __value, monthname(expenses.expend_date) as __text   from expenses order by 1 asc

list.definition: select id as __value, name as __text from categories
list.label: Categories
list.name: categories
list.query: select id as __value, name as __text from categories
